subject: Article Feedback - concat us
description_text:
Feedback for:  concat us  Inaccurate/irrelevant content   I have been trying to make contact for weeks about the missing parts to my purchase. It was a Xmas present and we are now past xmas and still can't use the product. I am very disappointed with this situation and if it doesn't get sorted this week I would like to return it all for a full refund  please. Thank you.
 
Tammy williams
 
07789930765
